key_risks: Geopolitical risks from U.S.-China trade tensions and export restrictions
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to global disruptions and reliance on Taiwan-based firms
Competitive pressure from established and emerging players
Technological obsolescence due to rapid advancements in semiconductor manufacturing
Legal risks from potential intellectual property disputes
controversies: History of patent litigation, including a 2017 settlement with Camtek
environmental_issues: Investments in energy-efficient systems and processes align with sustainability goals
social_issues: Labor shortages and inflationary pressures impacting operations
governance_issues: Exposure to geopolitical risks and supply chain disruptions
